Package simple.util.logging

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ErrorCodeResolver
    Interface for retrieving error strings from error codes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Log
    The preferred method for getting a log is to use LogFactory.getLogFor(Class).
    This ensures that only one log will be used per class and each log outputs to the same stream.
    LogFactory
    Factory for getting and setting logs for specific classes.
    Getting a log: LogFactory.getLogFor(Class), LogFactory.getLogFor(Object)
    Standard way of getting a log:
    Setting a log: private static final Log log = LogFactory.getLogFor(<your class>.class) LogFactory.setGlobalLogFile(File, boolean) LogFactory.setGlobalLogStream(PrintStream) LogFactory.setLogFileFor(Class, File, boolean) LogFactory.setLogStreamFor(Class, PrintStream) LogFactory.setLogFor(Class, Log) You can change the log for a class after it has been gotten.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogLevel

    Created: Nov 2, 2010
